record.description: First row: Palmer (1), Schwab (2), Hoben (3), Stafford (5), Slaughter (6); second row: Morgan (7), Reynolds (8), Radcliffe (9), Dawson (10), Woodward (11); third row: Haynes (12), Hardman (13), Morgan (14), Charles (15).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Numbered left to right, front row, middle row, back row.
